name: Sarthak Dev
position: Founder -The Dream Junction || Senior Associate Engineer- Global Foundries
about: As a Senior Associate Engineer at Global Foundries, I have been responsible for driving the success of projects and ensuring the smooth operation of manufacturing processes for FAB 1 - in Dresden (Germany), with my expertise in fault defect classification, statistical process control (SPC) ,contamination-free manufacturing, and CMOS process flow, I have contributed to the company's goal of achieving high-quality Outputs and efficiently completed daily deliverables . I am skilled in using statistical process control (SPC) and have proficiency in Microsoft Office and Python with sound knowledge of other basic programming languages. My strong communication,Fast learning and teamwork abilities have allowed me to collaborate effectively with crossfunctional teams with my Technical skills and dedication to excellence, I am committed to delivering the best results and driving continuous improvement

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: The dream junction is innovative learning and educational platform in ruralvillage of Prayagraj which connects dreamers with the opportunities andalong with this its unique way of establishing education as a way of learningin an entertaining and creative manner also it approach students byconnecting it with stories and some curious activities. it connects rural schoolgoing students to see the sea of opportunities and not to fall in the loopholeof Jobucation ( a term developed by us to explain people who thinkseducation is merely earned to get a job).
